title: Boutique Stay at Blueys Beach, NSW

title: Boutique Coastal Escape at Iconic Blueys Beach, NSW
description: Enjoy a self-contained stay by the beach that made the Mid-North Coast of New South Wales famous. Located in the stunning Pacific Palms region Blueys Retreat is nestled among a cluster of coastal villages only 20 minutes north of Seal Rocks. With its cobalt waters, rugged cliffs, coast-hugging roads and spectacular surf, this part of the New South Wales coastline is a must-visit.
offer_address: Blueys Retreat 285 Boomerang Drive, Pacific Palms NSW 2428
